Params: {3: 'The moment the transfer fails, Qu collapses onto the ground as if all the will to fight is gone in an instant.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Do you really have to help them... Huaxu? Even if it means disobeying me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You know full well... You're running out of time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'According to the experiment, the mind transfer has a higher success rate if conducted inside your M.I.N.D.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But if the transfer is stopped midway, your M.I.N.D. will collapse.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "There's no time for... finding any more vessels...", 4: '1'}
{3: '"Qu" keeps reaching into the air, as if groping for something.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'For the last time... I command you, Huaxu.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '...Qu seems to be trying to let Huaxu into her M.I.N.D.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I will give you half of my world, Huaxu.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'You will. You are better than any human.'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "It's a state where you're free from any control."}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'You mean like you? Having a physical body and the ability to act without the input of any command?'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "If you have a body, what's the first thing you want to do?"}
{3: '"Qu", as if entering into a self-embrace, retracts the extended arm. Raising the blade, "Qu" sends the blade within.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '...is to act on your own will, not on the commands of others...'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "I still don't know what love is."}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "But because you're human, because you used to be human, I wish that... humanity will still live on, with hope in their hearts."}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "Don't hurt anyone on my account, Villier."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: '...And here I am, believing that you have a mind of your own. Yet I was the one who kept ignoring your intent.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'The one who deprived you of freedom, the one who kept controlling you, was me...'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'm glad that at least in the end... I gave you... true freedom."}
{3: 'The ground shake. The buildings begin to collapseâ€”a sign that this space is rejecting the mind occupying it.'}
{3: 'In the midst of chaos, we catch a glimpse of a figure next to "Qu".'}
{3: 'The two stay locked in an embrace until they both fade away.'}
